sentences.sentence: Platoon with acrogenous panicle, white flowers. Long and round picine drupes.
sentences.translation: 圆锥花序顶生，花白色，核果长圆形，蓝黑色。

sentences.sentence: An Indian evergreen tree (Euphoria longan) having yellowish-brown drupes with white, juicy, edible flesh.
sentences.translation: 龙眼：一种印度产常绿乔木(龙眼龙眼属)，核果为黄褐色，果肉白色、多汁、可食。

sentences.sentence: An Indian evergreen tree (Euphoria longan) having yellowish - brown drupes with white, juicy, edible flesh.
sentences.translation: 龙眼一种印度产常绿乔木(龙眼龙眼属)，核果为黄褐色，果肉白色、多汁、可食。
